text: The Lady Eve is a 1941 American romantic comedy movie directed by Preston Sturges and was based on the story by Monckton Hoffe. It stars Barbara Stanwyck, Henry Fonda, Charles Coburn, Eugene Pallette, Eric Blore, Melville Cooper, Robert Greig and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1942. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1941 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Connecticut
title: The Lady Eve
